mapper.sql: usercode, parent_usercode, username, password, role_id, mobile, address, linkman, wechatpub_no, create_time, update_time, permission_list, extend1, extend2, extend3, extend4, extend5, extend6
mapper.select: select r.role_name from vend_user u,vend_role r where u.role_id=r.id and u.username=#{username}
select p.permission_id from vend_user u,vend_role r,vend_role_permission p where u.role_id=r.id and p.role_id=r.id and u.username=#{username}
mapper.insert: insert into vend_user (usercode, parent_usercode, username, password, role_id, mobile, address, linkman, wechatpub_no, create_time, update_time, permission_list, extend1, extend2, extend3, extend4, extend5, extend6 ) values (#{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentUsercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechatpubNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{permissionList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extend1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extend2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extend3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extend4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extend5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extend6,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
